outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
outputs.output_descr: Government leadership and coordination strengthened; Short-term measures implemented to address pressing capacity gaps; Key institutions supported to carry out their functions efficiently; long-term strategy in place for an effective public service.

project_descr: Public Service Reform and Institutional Capacity Development: A comprehensively reformed civil service that is efficient, transparent and accountable and able to design policies, implement programmes and deliver services to the citizens
